Stage.title: Stage
Stage.description: It allows the owner to divide the crowdfunding process on stages

Timetable.title: Timetable
Timetable.description: It allows the owner to create a schedule of stages into which the crowdfunding process will be divided

TimeEscrow.title: Time_Escrow
TimeEscrow.description: It allows the owner to create a schedule of stages into which the crowdfunding process based on escrow contract will be divided

Max.title: Max
Max.description: It allows the owner to limit the maximum amount of the contribution

Min.title: Min
Min.description: It allows the owner to limit the minimum amount of the contribution

Capped_min.title: Min with Cap
Capped_min.description: It implements the option of min and allows the owner to set the maximum of needed sum

Capped_max.title: Max with Cap
Capped_max.description: It implements the option of max and allows the owner to set the maximum of needed sum

Max_Wei.title: Cap
Max_Wei.description: It allows the owner to set the maximum of needed sum

List.title: List
List.description: It allows the owner to choose whom he will allow to participate in the crowdfunding process

Changerate.title: Changerate
Changerate.description: The price of token will grow all process

Pause.title: Pause
Pause.description: It allows the owner to pause the process

Individual.title: Individual
Individual.description: It allows the owner to set individual conditions for each investor
